I'm Hasanth, I'm an active blogger. I write articles on diverse topics, this helps me to make connections & give a new perspective which sometimes are missed(go un-noticed) when working in siloes.

In this blog, I share my personal experiences & some free-reads, working-articles, for readers to have a glimpse of my premium content published on Substack. Occasionally, I account my realtime answer-writing practice for UPSC - here
